name: Noise
description: Strays away from conventional structure, tonality, and composition and consists predominantly of noise.

children.name: Ambient Noise Wall
children.description: Soft, sparse textures inspired by the static composition of Harsh Noise Wall.

children.description: Soft, sparse textures inspired by the static composition of Harsh Noise Wall.

children.name: Black Noise
children.description: Incorporates unconventional sounds with overpowering or constant Noise and Black Metal elements, often being heavily texture-oriented, abrasive, dissonant, atonal, or repetitive.

children.name: Gorenoise
children.description: Combines and subverts Goregrind and Grindcore with brash Noise and even faster drum tempos.

children.name: Harsh Noise
children.description: Highly aggressive walls of sound that assault the listener.

children.name: Power Electronics
children.description: Waves of feedback, screeching analog synthesizers, and harsh, screamed vocals.

children.name: Power Noise
